EmailTemplate.description: Use this template to promote GlobalMeet Audio integration with Lync Online.
EmailTemplate.name: GlobalMeet Audio for Lync
EmailTemplate.subject: There's an Easier Way to Meet with Lync Online
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
THERE'S AN EASIER WAY TO MEET WITH LYNC ONLINE
GlobalMeet® Audio for Lync adds dial-in audio conferencing to Lync Online/Office 365, allowing you and your participants to join your meeting from anywhere, at any time.
Why GlobalMeet Audio for Lync?
You and your participants don't need to be at a computer/online to join the meeting Everyone can connect to the audio through a land-line or mobile phone Participants can choose to dial-in or have the meeting call them
Have questions? I am more than happy to answer any questions you may have. Contact me today.
{!User.FirstName}{!User.LastName} {!User.Email} {!User.Phone}
